question_text.en: An engineering student had to secure 45% marks to pass. He gets 157 marks and fails by 23 marks. The maximum mark is:

trick_application: Let the maximum marks be x.
To pass, the student needs 45% of x marks.
He gets 157 marks and fails by 23 marks, so he needed 157 + 23 = 180 marks to pass.
